title: 2 Bedroom Apartment at just 49 million
details:
993 sqft - Two Bedroom/Two Bathroom
Burma Teak Flooring
Fully Air Conditioned (VRV A/Cs)
ALPHA cupboard provided
German Kitchen fittings with Hood and Stove by Hafele
Pantry Cupboard by Se'a
Hansgrohe Fittings in Bathrooms
Double Glazed Glass for all windows
10 ft Ceiling with wall to wall windows
Rooftop infinity pool and clubhouse
